name: Eikthyrdeer

aura.name: guardian_of_the_forest
aura.description:
Can be ridden.
Can perform a double jump while mounted.
Increases efficiency of cutting trees.

description: The one who possesses the most impressive antlers becomes the leader of the herd. If their antlers are broken, they become depressed and leave the herd never to be seen again.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: antler_uppercut
skills.description: Eikthyrdeer's exclusive skill. Charges at foes and uses antlers to launch them into the air. If used while riding, the direction of the charge can be controlled.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: stone_cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: rock_lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
